fi.description:
Dragon Palace on Turun Puutorissa toimiva kiinalainen ravintola.
 Tarjoamme buffet-lounaan arkisin klo 11–15. Hinta 10,50 €. 
 Buffet sisältää sushia, kiinalaisia ruokia, päivän keiton, kahvin, teen ja makeisia.

en.description:
Dragon Palace is a Chinese restaurant located in Turku’s Puutori. 
 We serve a buffet lunch on weekdays from 11:00–15:00. Price €10.50. 
The buffet includes sushi, Chinese dishes, soup of the day, coffee, tea and desserts.
